original_text: And he shall stand before Eleazar the priest, who shall inquire for him by the judgment of the Urim before the Lord. At his word they shall go out, and at his word they shall come in, both he and all the people of Israel with him, the whole congregation.”
korean_text: 그는 제사장 엘르아살 앞에 설 것이요 엘르아살은 그를 위하여 우림의 판결로써 여호와 앞에 물을 것이며 그와 온 이스라엘 자손 곧 온 회중은 엘르아살의 말을 따라 나가며 들어올 것이니라

sentences.original_text: And he shall stand before Eleazar the priest
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 엘르아사르 제사장 앞에 설 것이요

sentences.original_text: who shall inquire for him by the judgment of the Urim
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그를 위해 우림의 판단으로 물을 것이며

sentences.original_text: At his word they shall go out
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 말에 따라 그들은 나갈 것이요

sentences.original_text: and at his word they shall come in
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 말에 따라 그들은 들어올 것이며

sentences.original_text: both he and all the people of Israel with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 그와 함께 있는 이스라엘 모든 백성이
